reviewText: A disclaimer is needed here first. I rate this 3 stars out of 5 on the Sexy/Kinkiness scale. As a movie it would be a zero stars effort except for Kei Mizutani. Add 3 stars for her as Naoko the Leather clad whip wielding Dom who along with Lulu a 1000 time phone sex call recipient competes for Misumi, Misumi's mother runs the phone club and essentially pushes the buttons of most of this cast of silly characters ( and there are quite a few).  I think I come down directly between the previous reviewers. It's not a movie nor are there even a lot of subplots or story-lines present. There are a lot of things tossed in together to see what happens. For example a man that sees himself as a mouse superhero. Also there is a zany pantyhose developer/salesman ( I think) that wants Lulu or Naoko's attention. There is a corporate competition of sorts to see who can trick who out of money/business etc as well as thoughts/actions that might lead to a Misumi arranged marriage. there is a recurring wild fantasy Lulu relives whenever a  mystery woman calls in. The scene select button I believe was invented for exactly this title. There are extras such as cast info and DVD/Rom features  that have the script, picture gallery as well as links ( that don't connect to source any longer) as well as an English Dub or Subtitles option which is a nice feature as well as trailers etc.  To sit through this one from beginning to end is going to be a tough go for you because this is as haphazard a collection of words and pictures that I have seen. Kei however has a great screen presence and 2 scenes in particular really capture your attention. 3 stars based on checking out Kei and those fetish driven scenes. whether that's enough reason to purchase is your dilemma.
I love this movie. Kei is beautiful, sassy and entertains no matter what she's doing. Buy this DVD if you can find it.
